page.metaDesc: Powerful cloud-based fleet management software with advanced analytics, real-time tracking, and mobile apps.

hero.title: SaaS Platform Features
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive fleet management software with powerful analytics

features.title: Cloud-Based Platform
features.description: Access your fleet data anytime, anywhere with our secure cloud infrastructure

features.title: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Real-time insights, predictive maintenance, and performance optimization

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: Bank-level encryption, role-based access, and compliance certifications

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: iOS and Android apps for drivers and managers with offline capability

features.title: Smart Alerts
features.description: Customizable notifications for speeding, geofence violations, and maintenance

features.title: Live Tracking
features.description: Real-time GPS tracking with route history and location sharing
